body.constraint: Project Files has 20-slot cap; minimize file count via bundles.

recommended_project_files_slots.keep: All current active OS core packs already in Project Files.

recommended_project_files_slots.why: All P0 deltas + reports in one slot; extract as needed.
All Termux + organizer tooling in one slot.
Upload only if you want phone-side provenance inside Project Files; otherwise keep on phone.

operating_rule.default: Project Files stores only bundles + active core; everything else stays on phone under MetaBlooms_Organized/INDEX.
operating_rule.promotion: Only promote to Project Files if it changes OS behavior or is required to reproduce a build.
